briefdescription.para: Enables the SERIAL over USB subsystem.

simplesect.para: Disabling this option saves both code and data space.

briefdescription.para: Enables the adcAcquireBus() and adcReleaseBus() APIs.

simplesect.para: Disabling this option saves both code and data space.

briefdescription.para: Sleep mode related APIs inclusion switch.
Enables the mutual exclusion APIs on the I2C bus.
Enables an event sources for incoming packets.

detaileddescription.para: If enabled this options inserts delays into the MMC waiting routines releasing some extra CPU time for the threads with lower priority, this may slow down the driver a bit however. This option is recommended also if the SPI driver does not use a DMA channel and heavily loads the CPU.

briefdescription.para: Number of positive insertion queries before generating the insertion event.
Interval, in milliseconds, between insertion queries.
Uses the SPI polled API for small data transfers.

detaileddescription.para: Polled transfers usually improve performance because it saves two context switches and interrupt servicing. Note that this option has no effect on large transfers which are always performed using DMAs/IRQs.

briefdescription.para: Number of initialization attempts before rejecting the card.

simplesect.para: MMC support is not yet implemented so this option must be kept at FALSE.

detaileddescription.para: If enabled this options inserts delays into the MMC waiting routines releasing some extra CPU time for the threads with lower priority, this may slow down the driver a bit however.
Configuration parameter, this is the baud rate selected for the default configuration.

Configuration parameter, you can change the depth of the queue buffers depending on the requirements of your application.
The default is 64 bytes for both the transmission and receive buffers.

simplesect.para: Disabling this option saves both code and data space.

briefdescription.para: Enables the spiAcquireBus() and spiReleaseBus() APIs.

simplesect.para: Disabling this option saves both code and data space.
